AF.Description: Html Interface Models using USGS and National Weather Service Data

AFDatabase.Name: PharmaWeatherDemo
AFDatabase.Description: Html Interface Models using USGS and National Weather Service Data

AFEnumerationSet.Name: WeatherConditions
AFEnumerationSet.Description: Golden Colorado Weather Condition Enumeration Set

AFAttributeTemplate.Name: Number Loaded
AFAttributeTemplate.ConfigString: SELECT Count(KilnID) FROM KilnLoadSchedule WHERE [KilnID] = 2 And [KilnLoadSchedule] >=@[|Start] and [KilnLoadSchedule] < @[|End]

AFAttributeTemplate.Name: SchdKilnLoadTime
AFAttributeTemplate.ConfigString: SELECT SchdKilnLoadDateTime FROM MaltingSchedule WHERE KilnID = 1 AND SchdKilnLoadDateTime >= '11/06/2016 00:00:00' AND SchdKilnLoadDateTime <= '11/10/2016 00:00:00' ORDER BY SchdKilnLoadDateTime;TZ=Mountain Standard Time

AFAttributeTemplate.Name: TestDateMath
AFAttributeTemplate.ConfigString: SELECT SchdKilnLoadDateTime FROM MaltingSchedule WHERE KilnID = 2 AND SchdKilnLoadDateTime >= '11/06/2016 00:00:00' AND SchdKilnLoadDateTime <= ('11/10/2016 00:00:00' + @[TestMinutes]) ORDER BY SchdKilnLoadDateTime;TZ=Mountain Standard Time

AFAttributeTemplate.Name: Delete_Null_Changes_Event
AFAttributeTemplate.Description: Build this manually. Use Excel for RDMBS Tags. Do not delete this tag. It calls the SP that deletes Exceptions in the table that have status = 0, thus no longer valid. Location 1=1, 4= 1 since this runs off a schedule

AFAttributeTemplate.Name: Delete_Null_Exceptions_Event
AFAttributeTemplate.Description: Build this manually. Use Excel for RDMBS Tags. Do not delete this tag. It calls the SP that deletes Changes in the table that have status = 0 and 72hrs old, thus no longer valid. Location 1=1, 4= 1 since this runs off a schedule

AFAttributeTemplate.Name: Timer_Hour
AFAttributeTemplate.Description: Built in AF. Uses Analytics to set tag. Do not delete as this is used for events on other tags.

AFAttributeTemplate.Name: Timer_Minute
AFAttributeTemplate.Description: Built in AF. Uses Analytics to set tag. Do not delete as this is used for events on other tags.

AFAnalysisRule.VariableMapping: Pull the hour on the hours plus 11 seconds||Timer_for_Deletions;Output||Timer_Hour;

AFAttributeTemplate.Name: Shift
AFAttributeTemplate.ConfigString: SELECT ShiftName FROM ManufacturingShifts WHERE ShiftID = 1

AFTimeRule.ConfigString: Day=Sun, Mon, Tue, Wed, Thu, Fri, Sat
Day=Sun, Mon, Tue, Wed, Thu, Fri, Sat

AFNotificationRuleTemplate.Name: TempLessThan10
AFNotificationRuleTemplate.Description: Temperature Less than 10 degrees and greater and zero

Property.Value: generated a new notification event.
